summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 19th Avenue Southwest from West Austin Street to West Holden Street; and certain other streets and avenues, by grading and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 16596 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said distirct payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
